text: læa phraxngkh nan khux phu thi thrng hı mi khun sung swn thanghlay thang thi thuk hı mi ran khun læa mi thuk hı mi ran khun læa tn xin th phala m læa phuch doythi phl khxng man tang«kan læa tn say tun læa tn thabthim doythi mi khwam lamay khlay kan læa mi lamay khlay kan cng briphokh cak phl khxng man theid meux xxk phl læa cng cay swn xanpen siththi nı man dwy nı wan hæng kar kebkeiyw man læa cng xya fumfeuxy thanghlay
